title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I don't understand what this message means.
OB: When I try to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
1. Open a binary project like org.apache.ant.
2. Attempt to view the type hierarchy.
3. Observe the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
